name: NSFileProviderItemCapabilities
desc: An itemâ€™s capabilities, which define the actions that the user can perform in the document browser.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Returns a newly created item capabilities value.

items.name: static var allowsAddingSubItems: NSFileProviderItemCapabilities
items.desc: A value indicating that the user can add subitems.

items.name: static var allowsContentEnumerating: NSFileProviderItemCapabilities
items.desc: A value indicating that the item's contents can be enumerated.

items.name: static var allowsDeleting: NSFileProviderItemCapabilities
items.desc: A value indicating that the item can be deleted.

items.name: static var allowsEvicting: NSFileProviderItemCapabilities
items.desc: A value indicating that the system can delete the local copy of the item.

items.name: static var allowsReading: NSFileProviderItemCapabilities
items.desc: A value indicating that the value can be read from.

items.name: static var allowsRenaming: NSFileProviderItemCapabilities
items.desc: A value indicating that the item can be renamed.

items.name: static var allowsReparenting: NSFileProviderItemCapabilities
items.desc: A value indicating that the item can be moved.

items.name: static var allowsTrashing: NSFileProviderItemCapabilities
items.desc: A value indicating that the item can be moved to the trash.

items.name: static var allowsWriting: NSFileProviderItemCapabilities
items.desc: A value indicating that the item can be written to.

items.name: static var allowsExcludingFromSync: NSFileProviderItemCapabilities
items.desc: A value indicating that the user can exclude the item from sync operations.
